stochastic_function: lambda screening_decision: {'exist': 5e-10, 'not exist': 1 - 5e-10} if screening_decision == 'screen' else {'exist': 5.0 * 5e-10, 'not exist': 1 - 5.0 * 5e-10}

lambda screening_decision, smuggled_nuclear_threat: {'signal': 0.8, 'no signal': 0.2} if screening_decision == 'screen' and smuggled_nuclear_threat == 'exist' else {'signal': 0.025, 'no signal': 0.975} if screening_decision == 'screen' and smuggled_nuclear_threat == 'not exist' else {'signal': 0.0, 'no signal': 1.0}

lambda smuggled_nuclear_threat, inspection_decision: {'find threat': 0.9, 'no threat found': 0.1} if smuggled_nuclear_threat == 'exist' and inspection_decision == 'inspect' else {'find threat': 0.0, 'no threat found': 1.0}
lambda smuggled_nuclear_threat, inspection_result: {-100000000000.0: 0.9, 0.0: 0.1} if smuggled_nuclear_threat == 'exist' and inspection_result == 'threat not found' else {0.0: 1.0}
lambda inspection_result: {-100000: 1.0, 0: 0.0} if inspection_result == 'find threat' else {0: 1.0, -100000: 0.0}
